scripts.dev:all: pnpm --filter=@packages/definitions dev & pnpm --filter=backend dev & pnpm --filter=frontend dev
scripts.clean: find . -type d -name 'node_modules' -o -name '.turbo' -o -name 'dist' -o -name 'build' -o -name '.next' -o -name 'out' | xargs rm -rf && find . -name 'pnpm-lock.yaml' -not -path './pnpm-lock.yaml' -o -name '*.log' -o -name '.DS_Store' | xargs rm -f
